paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

if __name__ == '__main__':
    conf = SparkConf()
    sc = SparkContext.getOrCreate(conf=conf)
    
    spark = Spark = SparkSession(sc).builder.appName("Read-and-write-data-to-Hive-table-spark").config("hive.metastore.uris", "thrift://hive-hive-metastore-1:9083").enableHiveSupport().getOrCreate()
